spaceinvaders.client.mvc

Class GameModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • spaceinvaders.client.mvc.GameModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.concurrent.Callable<java.lang.Void>, Model, Service<java.lang.Void>

    public class GameModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements Model
    Provides the game data.

    This is a gateway to the server. It is used to get data out of the server and feed it into the controller. Every command that is sent to the server goes through here.
